Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- Acknowledge System now Bidirektional.
 - Yellow and Green Eye shows if you see the other with his actual appearance.
 - Yellow Clock and Green Checkmark shows you if the other Player has loaded you like you see yourself.
 - Default setting for **Show Acknowledgement Notifications** is now unchecked.
 - Default location for **Acknowledgement Notifications** has been changed from Chat to Toast.
